inclusion.criterion: surgical diagnosis of endometriosis within 5 years
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Pap smear in a 54-year-old woman revealed abnormal cervical squamous intraepithelial/glandular lesion.

inclusion.criterion: willing to use non-hormonal contraception, history of regular menstrual cycles
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is willing to use non-hormonal contraception

exclusion.criterion: hysterectomy, surgical treatment for endometriosis within 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: She is otherwise healthy. She was offered conization.
